tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ
comments: He\'s okay. I had to memorize everything in the book, but I was able to get an A. You have to put a lot of energy and time in the class. I am aware this is college, but the work can be a bit unexpectedly rigorous for the subject. His grading system is fair though. He does not respond to emails unless you have a huge emergency. So, go to office hours

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The class is super boring, just power point presentations, never explains the homework. You can barely hear him. You really need to read the book to succeed in this class

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This is a horrible course DO NOT TAKE IT!! At least not with Cohen. He is very monotone, it\'s all slideshows and videos easy to get lost or confused it doesn\'t make much sense and he won\'t explain it. He expects you to know and auto understand!?

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The worst teacher I\'ve ever taken in college, makes no effort to return assignments so you never know what your grade is! Stay away from him!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: If you are a serious student, you will pass. I got an A. Those that complain are the type that barely show up, leave early, don\'t do HW, and don\'t study. Then they wonder why they don\'t pass. They come here and blame the teacher for THEIR failure. Not a bad class at all, don\'t listen to these people.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Dont take his class Its unbelievable the way he lectures terrible I wish he was more interesting and spoke with a different tone of voice and tries to be so clear and incredibly correct that it gets annoying His study guide has all the chapters mixed up He puts no effort into trying to make his lectures fun and interesting like other professors

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: He speaks in a monotone voice & lectures from a power point with the lights off, he\'s asking for people to fall asleep. 85percent of each lecture is off-topic about his random personal opinions. I constantly left class because of his narrow-minded opinions he kept preaching. I was so confused about what the class was even teaching, but I got an A.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Easy class. People that complain are obviously lazy. This is college people. Study and you will pass.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: He does lecture alot, so you dont get lot of time to take notes BUT he has a study guide online if you follow that you can pass. thats what I did and i got a B also there is homework everyweek but uts realy easy

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I LOVED his class! He\'s so jolly, funny and extremely helpful. His quizes and tests are not too hard as long as you do the homework and study a bit. His class is very interesting, and informative. Prior to Mr. Cohen\'s class, I was not interested in Anthropology, let alone Linguistic Anthro, but after his class I now absolutely love it. A+ Teacher.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This is the worst teacher at Mission (also teaches at CSUN). He is so boring! and he laughs at his lame jokes, its pathetic. Mandatory textbooks, attending class, no one looked forward to this class. Take anyone but Cohen, if you can, trust me.
